pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, February 18, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

3:25 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Marie-Claude Bibeau, will virtually meet with NuHaven Cattle Co., a company located in Pine Lake, Alberta.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Marie-Claude Bibeau and the Member of Parliament for Châteauguay—Lacolle Brenda Shanahan, will virtually meet with Hydroserre Inc. and visit the company’s vegetable greenhouses located in Sainte-Clotilde-de-Châteauguay, Quebec.

The Prime Minister will host a call with Provincial and Territorial Premiers.

Closed to media.
